name: Beggar
message: You again... Have you had enough of this place?

name: Traveler
message: This is not the place I remember... this used to be a good place to live

name: Beggar
message: There has been a long time since that...

name: Traveler
message: Why doesn't anyone ask for an audience with the king?

name: Beggar
message: An audience with the king?? We? hahahha... don't make me laugh, we are nothing for them

name: Traveler
message: Something has to be done... You can't live like that

name: Beggar
message: It is what it is... nothing can do anything

name: Beggar
message: And you... you are just a little traveler with no home

name: Beggar
message: Go away from here while you can...
